meanings.definition: To move or act aimlessly or idly
meanings.sent1: The cat puttered around the yard, exploring every corner.
meanings.sent2: She puttered through her room, not sure what to do next.
meanings.sent3: The old man puttered along the sidewalk, lost in his thoughts.
meanings.sent4: The wind puttered through the leaves, creating a soothing rustling sound.
meanings.sent5: The toy car puttered slowly across the floor, entertaining the child.

meanings.definition: To make a series of soft, intermittent sounds
meanings.sent1: The rain puttered on the roof, lulling me to sleep.
meanings.sent2: The coffee machine puttered as it brewed a fresh cup.
meanings.sent3: The distant engine puttered in the quiet night, a comforting sound.
meanings.sent4: The old radio puttered to life, playing a nostalgic tune.
meanings.sent5: The fireplace puttered softly, warming the room on a cold evening.

meanings.definition: To tinker or work with something in a casual or ineffective manner
meanings.sent1: He puttered with the broken watch, trying to fix it without success.
meanings.sent2: She puttered with the puzzle pieces, rearranging them randomly.
meanings.sent3: The child puttered with the toy tools, pretending to be a handyman.
meanings.sent4: The mechanic puttered with the engine, attempting to diagnose the issue.
meanings.sent5: The gardener puttered in the flower bed, planting seeds haphazardly.
